thread.title: Weekend Break in great hotel
thread.title_full: Weekend Break in great hotel - Review of Hotel Soft, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Geoff M
title: Weekend Break in great hotel
text: We had a weekend break in Paris and consider ourselves really lucky to have stumbled upon this quality hotel at very reasonable prices. Special mention must go to Daman and Ahmed who were truly excellent. The hotel is really convenient for Gare de l'EST and Gare du Nord, it's really clean and comfortable. Daman and Ahmed went above and beyond with their help and advice and we would strongly recommend this hotel to anybody.
